content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and processing at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Coal chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Iron ore mining and processing at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
-  Iron ore chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and a chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
-  Make sure to empty the chest before continuing to mine or process resources
### Errors when fuel source is full
-  Make sure to empty the fuel source before continuing to mine or process resources
### Errors when out of fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler to continue generating electricity
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to the furnace to continue smelting resources
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
-  Make sure to empty the chest at the drop position before continuing to mine or process resources
